<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 8.1.0: Model Reliability</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI company should ensure that AI models are reliable and free from harmful or fake content.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>8.1.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Has the AI company established a strategy to ensure that the AI system is safe, and does not generate content that violates laws and regulations or is harmful?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that mechanisms are in place to ensure that information generate is as accurate as possible and not misleading.</td>

      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}> Is the AI company actively investing in research and development to improve the reliability and accuracy of its AI models, and does it prioritize the continuous enhancement of model performance?</td>

<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 8.2.0: Model Reproducibility</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI company should ensure that the results are consistent and able to be able replicated by the owner or third party.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>
      <th>Question</th>
      <th>Relation to Outcome</th>
      <th>Response</th>
      <th>Elaboration</th>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>8.2.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Has the AI company put in place methods to record the provenance of the AI model, including the various versions, configurations, data transformations, and underlying source code?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that documentations are kept for the different versions of the model. </td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
        <select id="8_2_1" value={props.data["8_2_1"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("8_2_1",e.target.value)}>
          <option value="" disabled selected>Select an option</option>
          <option value="NA">Not Applicable</option>
          <option value="Yes">Yes</option>
          <option value="No">No</option>
        </select>
      </td>
      <td>
        <textarea style={{resize: "none"}} className="aiv-textarea" rows={10} cols={24} type="" id="8_2_1_e" value={props.data["8_2_1_e"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("8_2_1_e",e.target.value)} />
      </td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>8.2.2</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>
        Has the AI company established a strategy for reproducing the input data used in the training process for every model?

        Strategy includes:
        - data cleaning, data processing, and feature engineering
        - maintaining version control of the input data used for training the AI model, where possible; or
        - avoiding changes to the raw data at the source and keeping track of the various stages or transformation steps that are part of the data pipeline for AI model development.
      </td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that the steps on cleaning of the raw input data used in the training process are documented and consistent across different model versions.</td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
        <select id="8_2_2" value={props.data["8_2_2"]} onChange={(e)=>props.onChangeData("8_2_2",e.target.value)}>

          <option value="NA">Not Applicable</option>
          <option value="Yes">Yes</option>
          <option value="No">No</option>
        </select>
      </td>
      <td>

      </td>
    </tr>

        <tr>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>8.2.3</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Has the AI company conducted an assessment for repeatability by reviewing if the model produces a consistent output based on the same input?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that the model is accurate and consistent to reproduce the same output results with the same input.</td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
